trans-unit.source: Provides data for manifest-based activation of an application.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for manifest-basert aktivering av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The ActivationArguments class is used by the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ActivationArguments brukes av <xref:System.AppDomainSetup>klasse.</xref:System.AppDomainSetup>

trans-unit.source: The manifest-based activation model uses an application manifest rather than an assembly for activation.
trans-unit.target: Manifest-basert aktivering modellen bruker et programmanifest i stedet for en samling for aktivering.

trans-unit.source: A manifest fully describes the application, its dependencies, security requirements, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Et manifest beskriver fullstendig programmet, avhengigheter, sikkerhetskrav og så videre.

trans-unit.source: The manifest model has several advantages over the assembly-based activation model, especially for Web applications.
trans-unit.target: Manifest modellen har flere fordeler over samlingen-basert aktivering modellen, spesielt for webprogrammer.

trans-unit.source: For example, the manifest contains the security requirements of the application, which enables the user to decide whether to allow the application to execute before downloading the code.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel inneholder manifestet sikkerhetskrav for applikasjonen, som lar brukeren bestemme om at programmet skal kjøre før du laster ned koden.

trans-unit.source: The manifest also contains information about the application dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen inneholder informasjon om programmet-avhengigheter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"></xref> class with the specified activation context.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"> </xref> klasse angitte Aktiveringskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ActivationContext> object represented by the `activationData` parameter contains the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> and context information for manifest-based activation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ActivationContext>objektet som representeres av den `activationData` parameteren inneholder den <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>og informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst for manifest-baserte aktivering.</xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> </xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies the manifest-based activation application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer manifest-basert aktivering-programmet.

trans-unit.source: activationData is .
trans-unit.target: activationDatais .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"></xref> class with the specified application identity.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"> </xref> klassen med den angitte tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: The application identity uniquely identifies a manifest-based application to be activated in a new domain.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteprogramidentiteten identifiserer et manifest-basert program aktiveres i et nytt domene.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies the manifest-based activation application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer manifest-basert aktivering-programmet.

trans-unit.source: applicationIdentity is .
trans-unit.target: applicationIdentityis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"></xref> class with the specified activation context and activation data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"> </xref> klassen med den angitte Aktiveringskonteksten og Aktiveringsdata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ActivationContext> object represented by the `activationContext` parameter contains the <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> and context information for manifest-based activation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ActivationContext>objektet som representeres av den `activationContext` parameteren inneholder den <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>og informasjon om sikkerhetskontekst for manifest-baserte aktivering.</xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> </xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: The activation data consists of information such as the query string portion of a URL.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveringsdata består av informasjon, for eksempel spørringen streng del av en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies the manifest-based activation application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer manifest-basert aktivering-programmet.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings containing host-provided activation data.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av strenger som inneholder gjeldende verten Aktiveringsdata.

trans-unit.source: activationContext is .
trans-unit.target: activationContextis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"></xref> class with the specified application identity and activation data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"> </xref> klassen med den angitte identitet og aktivering programdata.

trans-unit.source: The application identity uniquely identifies a manifest-based application to be activated in a new domain.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteprogramidentiteten identifiserer et manifest-basert program aktiveres i et nytt domene.

trans-unit.source: The activation data consists of information such as the query string portion of a URL.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveringsdata består av informasjon, for eksempel spørringen streng del av en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies the manifest-based activation application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer manifest-basert aktivering-programmet.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings containing host-provided activation data.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av strenger som inneholder gjeldende verten Aktiveringsdata.

trans-unit.source: applicationIdentity is .
trans-unit.target: applicationIdentityis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the activation context for manifest-based activation of an application.
trans-unit.target: Henter Aktiveringskonteksten for manifest-baserte aktivering av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ActivationContext> object contains an <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> and provides internal-only access to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ActivationContext>objektet inneholder en <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>og gir bare intern tilgang til programmanifestet.</xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> </xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: The activation context is used during manifest-based activation to set up the domain policy and provide an application-based security model.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveringskonteksten brukes under manifest-basert aktivering konfigurere domenepolicyen og angi en applikasjon kodebasert sikkerhet-modell.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies a manifest-based activation application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer et manifest-basert aktivering-program.

trans-unit.source: Gets activation data from the host.
trans-unit.target: Henter Aktiveringsdata fra verten.

trans-unit.source: The activation data consists of information such as the query string portion of a URL.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveringsdata består av informasjon, for eksempel spørringen streng del av en URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: An array of strings containing host-provided activation data.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av strenger som inneholder gjeldende verten Aktiveringsdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application identity for a manifest-activated application.
trans-unit.target: Henter tjenesteprogramidentiteten for et manifest-aktivert program.

trans-unit.source: The application identity uniquely identifies a manifest-based application to be activated in a new domain.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteprogramidentiteten identifiserer et manifest-basert program aktiveres i et nytt domene.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies an application for manifest-based activation.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer et program for manifest-baserte aktivering.

trans-unit.source: Produces a copy of the current <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Produserer en kopi av gjeldende <xref href="System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments> object, and then populates it with copies of the members of the current <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments> object
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter en ny <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments>objektet, og deretter tabellen fylles ut med kopier av medlemmer av den gjeldende <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments>objektnavn</xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments> </xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ActivationArguments>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av det gjeldende objektet.
